column5: Chatting with my buddy Colin the other night when the topic of our first "backcountry" canoe trip came upAfter so many laughs I thought - this is a post that I need to write There is no walleye fishing (some bass though) but overall I'd like to believe its a fairly funny read and thought I would share Here is the linkhttps://www.northernjacks.com/post/t...algonquin-parkCheersAndrew
Another good read! Thanks for the time and effort you put into all of this--I really enjoy (and very much relate to) your trip reports and other posts.
Great story and life long memories for you and your friends.

Thanks for the feedback and glad you enjoyed it I have found writing these out to be a great way to extend the memory so to speak Just need to get better at bringing my camera our more as there are times where I have stories but no photos lol
